thread.section_title: Sports Jobs and Sports Internships - WorkInSports.com
thread.title: PR Intern - Spring 2016 - Sports Marketing

title: PR Intern - Spring 2016 - Sports Marketing
text: *Public Relations/Media Relations *Social Media *Feature Writing *Event Management *Graphics Design   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
